howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three simple steps to elevate your photos

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop your photo or browse files. Supported formats include JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: Our cutting-edge AI enhances facial features while retaining the overall image quality.

items.title: Download Result
items.description: Preview your enhanced image and download it in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless users who have elevated their photos with our AI

items.name: Emily Smith
items.comment: The AI enhancement made my family portraits look professional! I'm thrilled.

items.name: James Lee

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about AI Face Enhancement

items.title: What features can the AI enhance?
items.description: The AI can enhance a variety of facial features including skin texture, eye brightness, and overall clarity, making your photos look stunning.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed entirely free?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user is granted 30 free enhancement credits daily, enabling you to enhance numerous images. Additional credits can be earned through activities or challenges.

items.title: Can enhanced images be used commercially?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can use enhanced images for commercial purposes. Free users may only use them for personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All enhancements occur directly in your browser, ensuring your images are never uploaded or stored on external servers. Once you exit the tab, all processing data is deleted.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the difference. No sign-up needed.
